import React, { useEffect } from 'react' const Users = () => { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3001/users') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setUsers(data)) .catch(error => console.log(error)); }) return (
